## Description
## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Maintenance (dependency updates, CI/CD changes, etc.)

## PR Checklist
- [ ] **Tests Written**: I have added tests for all new or changed code to ensure quality and reliability.
- [ ] **Tests Passing**: All local tests (`pytest`) and CI checks are passing.
- [ ] **Changelog Updated**: I have added a description of my changes to the "Unreleased" section of `CHANGELOG.md`.toml`.
